<title>scoreserver</title>
scoreserver is a django application to store and show game highscores.

While it can be used with virtually any game, it is developped to keep <a href="http://devnewton.bci.im/scoreserver"><strong>Newton Adventure highscores</strong></a>.
<h1>Features</h1>
<h2>Frontend</h2>
<p>The frontend allows to browse games, levels and players highscore tables.</p>
<img src="frontend.png"/>
<h2>Backend</h2>
<p>The backend allows administrator to create games and levels. Players and scores can be edited or removed.</p>
<img src="backend.png"/>
<h2>Integration with ajax</h2>
<p>A simple ajax request is needed to add highscore table to any website.</p>
<img src="ajax.png" />
